settings.question: Natural Supplements for High Blood Pressure & Hypertension
settings.answer_body1: High blood pressure is a common affliction across the world, affecting 1 in 4 men and 1 in 5 women globally, according to the World Health Organization. Using blood pressure supplements in your daily life can have a tremendous effect on your body, helping to lower blood pressure and keep hypertension under control. At Well Well Well we have the right supplements to help lower blood pressure naturally in conjunction with your Doctor's recommendation.

settings.question: What are some natural ways at lowering blood pressure?
settings.answer_body1: Reducing blood pressure naturally includes diet. Higher salt and sodium diets put individuals at greater risk. Change of diet can play a huge role in lowering blood pressure naturally in addition to taking supplements. The best supplements to lower blood pressure depend on a person's overall health and prescribed medication. Herbal and natural supplements for high blood pressure health supplements include coenzyme Q10, magnesium, taurine, ginger and high doses of lysine and vitamin C. Shop at Well Well Well for all your high blood pressure supplements online in Canada and worldwide.

settings.question: What is magnesium's impact on hypertension (high blood pressure)?
settings.answer_body1: The top all natural blood pressure supplements to reduce blood pressure include a variety of targeted heart health supplements. For example magnesium for hypertension is a safe and natural supplement to lower blood pressure for pregnant women. It can increase the production of nitric oxide â€” a signaling molecule that helps relax blood vessels. Magnesium is a great vitamin for high blood pressure and safe to take with medication. However, always consult your physician to find the best blood pressure support supplement

settings.question: What are the causes of Hypertension?
settings.answer_body1: Causes of hypertension include high sodium intake, fatty foods, excessive alcohol and obesity. Gestational hypertension conditions happen when you only have high blood pressure during pregnancy. Supplements for lowering blood pressure during pregnancy include, vitamin D, folic acid and omega 3's. The best supplement for high blood pressure will be dependent on each individual's needs. With hypertension being a major cause of premature death all around the world, the use of natural and organic supplements for high blood pressure is important to those most at risk.

settings.question: How much magnesium should I take for high blood pressure?
settings.answer_body1: Continuing studies have proven the positive effect of magnesium taurate in lowering systolic blood pressure. Taking magnesium as a blood pressure supplement is encouraged for those who are not getting the recommended daily intake, but dosage should be based on each individual case.

settings.question: What are the worst foods for inflammation?
settings.answer_body1: Foods that can worsen inflammation include caffeine, processed foods, saturated and trans fats, refined sugars and carbohydrates, alcohol and Casein (found in most dairy products). When taking anti-inflammatory herbs and supplements, it is recommended that these foods should be drastically reduced or removed from your diet altogether.
